content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin. 

Genetically modified crops have been developed that produce a protein that makes the plants resistant to insect pests. Other genetic modifications make the crops more resistant to chemicals that kill plants (herbicides).
content.question: For each of the risks you described in part (a), propose a practical approach for reducing the risk.

frqParts.text: For each of the risks you described in part (a), propose a practical approach for reducing the risk.

topic.text: 1.1: Structure of Water and Hydrogen Bonding

skill.text: 6.C: Provide reasoning to justify a claim by connecting evidence to biological theories.
